name: SureFire CPR
tag_list: cpr-classes, acls, pals, pears, ekg, ecg, pharmacology, nrp, bls, cpr-certification, onsite-cpr-training
overview:
SureFire CPR is an industry leading CPR and First Aid instruction company serving Orange County, Los Angeles, San Diego, Corona, Riverside, San Bernardino and the greater Southern California area. They take great pride in helping each of our customers achieve their goal of obtaining a CPR certification, ACLS Classes, PALS Classes, PEARS Training, Neonate Resuscitation (NRP), BLS certification, AED training or completing a First Aid class.

What sets their training apart is the elite staff’s first-hand knowledge and daily experience with 911 emergencies. The team of instructors consists of professional Firefighters, Paramedics, Lifeguards, ER Nurses and EMT’s. Their skills are of the highest caliber because They have dedicated their lives to serving the public.

SureFire CPR uses the most realistic training equipment on the market. They specialize in on-site training and consistently provide CPR certification, BLS certification, AED training and other First Aid classes for high profile clients. Orange County ACLS classes and PALS classes are their specialty. Regularly scheduled classes are available at their two Orange County offices: Laguna Hills and Orange. SureFire CPR looks forward to training you in what they do best - saving lives.
